oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Davy Crockett portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of Davy Crockett (1786-1836) by S.S. Osgood. Protrait from the waist up. He wears a dark suit, vest and necktie with a white shirt collar that meets his jawline. He wears sideburns facial hair.
Pioneer and U.S. Congressman from Tennessee, 1827-1831, 1833-1835.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crockett, Davy, 1786-1836
Crockett, Davy, 1786-1836;Crockett, Davy, 1786-1836. Narrative of the life of David Crockett of the state of Tennessee;Tennessee. General Assembly
Legislators;Sideburns
